text: @realDonaldTrump there's nothing united about the united states since @potus believes black lives don't matter or any lives for that matter! #covid19 showed the world that! how about addressing the nation to quell the violence & show leadership! oh wait it's you 💩 #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter
